channel.title: Help with some 317 stuff
channel.description:
how can i make the farmer house in egdeville so only i can get inn and i have to unlock the door to the other players for them to get inn? and its like a command like ::unlockthedoor4 [playername]?
and I got a few questions to :D
1. how can i make a pickup command for admin and mods? like mods can ONLY type ::pickup for mod stuff and same with admin ONLY admin stuff and owner is ok they can pickup everything?
2. how to make admin armour, mod armour and owner armour untradeable?
3. how to make so when staff die they dont loose theyr staff armour it comes up a writing ONLY if the staff has that item "your STAFF armour has been deleted" and the armour piece has been deleted instead off dropped?
4. how can i make simple mystery events like (santa event) u talk to santa and u tele to a place and u talk to that guy and get something?

item.title: Help with some 317 stuff
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:4, topic:312145”][quote author=kneistol link=topic=408587.msg3016009#msg3016009 date=1257195892]
how can i make the farmer house in egdeville so only i can get inn and i have to unlock the door to the other players for them to get inn?
and its like a command like ::unlockthedoor4 [playername]?

and I got a few questions to

  1. how can i make a pickup command for admin and mods? like mods can ONLY type ::pickup for mod stuff and same with admin ONLY admin stuff and owner is ok they can pickup everything?

  2. how to make admin armour, mod armour and owner armour untradeable?

  3. how to make so when staff die they dont loose theyr staff armour it comes up a writing ONLY if the staff has that item
    “your STAFF armour has been deleted” and the armour piece has been deleted instead off dropped?

  4. how can i make simple mystery events like (santa event) u talk to santa and u tele to a place and u talk to that guy and get something?
    [/quote]

im not sure you could do that, but you could make an owner zone command to where it teles you there, and you could tele ppl there.

#1. Make a custom command like ::modarmor and ::adminarmor? and just ::pickup for you.

#2. idk how to make it untradeable but use this code to make it non weildable by other players.

if(wearID == ITEMID && playerrights == 0){
sM(“You must be a STAFF POSITION HERE to wield this item.”);
return false;
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2009, 03:32:17 pm[/size][hr][quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=408587.msg3016033#msg3016033 date=1257197097]
um… there is a program called commandgenerator by a moparscape user named davidi or something. ask him he should be able to help you out! or search his name.
[/quote]

thats 508 only[/quote]

thx but where to paste the?

if(wearID == ITEMID && playerrights == 0){
sM(“You must be a STAFF POSITION HERE to wield this item.”);
return false;
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2009, 12:16:02 am[/size][hr][quote=“dillktm65, post:3, topic:312145”][quote]}

    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sM("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
	}
    }[/quote] thats the code change the  playerRights > 1) ## in that to 2 for admin[/quote]

hey noob i know you did mean it well but i meant so admins can only do ::pickup 18909 1 for admin armour and not all other pickeps and dude i know how to change playerrights

Read full topic

item.title: Help with some 317 stuff
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:1, topic:312145”]how can i make the farmer house in egdeville so only i can get inn and i have to unlock the door to the other players for them to get inn?
and its like a command like ::unlockthedoor4 [playername]?

and I got a few questions to

  1. how can i make a pickup command for admin and mods? like mods can ONLY type ::pickup for mod stuff and same with admin ONLY admin stuff and owner is ok they can pickup everything?

  2. how to make admin armour, mod armour and owner armour untradeable?

  3. how to make so when staff die they dont loose theyr staff armour it comes up a writing ONLY if the staff has that item
    “your STAFF armour has been deleted” and the armour piece has been deleted instead off dropped?

  4. how can i make simple mystery events like (santa event) u talk to santa and u tele to a place and u talk to that guy and get something?[/quote]

im not sure you could do that, but you could make an owner zone command to where it teles you there, and you could tele ppl there.

#1. Make a custom command like ::modarmor and ::adminarmor? and just ::pickup for you.

#2. idk how to make it untradeable but use this code to make it non weildable by other players.

if(wearID == ITEMID && playerrights == 0){
sM(“You must be a STAFF POSITION HERE to wield this item.”);
return false;
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2009, 03:32:17 pm[/size][hr][quote=“sonicforce41, post:2, topic:312145”]um… there is a program called commandgenerator by a moparscape user named davidi or something. ask him he should be able to help you out! or search his name.[/quote]

thats 508 only

Read full topic

item.description:
@dillktm65 wrote:

} 
    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sM("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
	}
    }</blockquote> thats the code change the  playerRights > 1) ## in that to 2 for admin
